InstructionTitle: Assemble Portable App<strike>Web</strike>'s from Html/Json to build Static Web Pages
InstructionSubTitle: Tool to View Html Assembled from html/json files

InstructionList.InfoItem: Split Your Html Pages into Html and Json Fragments and Copy it into Component Folder of the AppSites Folder
Edit the Json data fragments to customize with your own data using the Offline AppWeb Configuring Tool
